publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5180 Mike Pringle: Cyclical Vomiting Syndrome Association—That the Parliament recognises cyclical vomiting syndrome as a serious medical condition affecting up to 2% of school-age children; sympathises with all those who suffer from this serious debilitating illness which is very difficult to diagnose; commends the Cyclical Vomiting Syndrome Association UK for raising awareness of the illness, and calls on NHS boards to offer more support to sufferers and their families.

S2M-5180 Mike Pringle: Cyclical Vomiting Syndrome Association—That the Parliament recognises cyclical vomiting syndrome as a serious medical condition affecting up to 2% of school-age children; sympathises with all those who suffer from this serious debilitating illness which is very difficult to diagnose; commends the Cyclical Vomiting Syndrome Association UK for raising awareness of the illness, and calls on NHS boards to offer more support to sufferers and their families.
S2M-5180 Cyclical Vomiting Syndrome Association (lodged on 16 November 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5180 Cyclical Vomiting Syndrome Association (lodged on 16 November 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
